New Records: The Los Angeles Clippers have won three straight games and five of their last six matches.
The New Orleans Pelicans have lost 10 straight games and 19 of their last 20 games.
Key Match Events: Norman Powell scored 35 points for the Los Angeles Clippers.
James Harden made go-ahead free throws with 17.9 seconds left to secure the win.
Officials reviewed a foul call and a jump ball after a missed free throw by Yves Missi.
CJ McCollum hit a half-court shot but it did not affect the outcome of the game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Clippers converted 14 offensive rebounds into 20 second-chance points.
The Pelicans hit a season-best 18 three-pointers but it wasn't enough for the win.
Others: The Clippers' defensive performance in the paint and on free throws was key to their victory.
